classes.name: IgnitionGateway
classes.description: The main gateway context object providing access to all gateway subsystems. Available via SRContext.get() in gateway scope scripts.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Returns the gateway context singleton instance.

methods.name: getTagManager
methods.description: Returns the tag manager for reading, writing, and configuring tags.

methods.name: getDatasourceManager
methods.description: Returns the datasource manager for managing database connections.

methods.name: getAlarmManager
methods.description: Returns the alarm manager for alarm configuration and state.

methods.name: getProjectManager
methods.description: Returns the project manager for accessing Ignition projects.

methods.name: getEdition
methods.description: Returns the edition of this Ignition installation.

classes.name: NamedQueryManager
classes.description: Provides access to named queries configured in Ignition projects. Allows executing named queries from gateway-scoped scripts.

methods.name: runNamedQuery

returns.description: The query results as a dataset

methods.description: Executes a named query and returns the result.

methods.name: runNamedQuery

returns.description: The query results as a dataset

methods.description: Executes a named query with an operation name for logging context.
